description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cg3ca","text":"This is a step by step protocol used to differentiate  mouse NPCs to mature neurons. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ddg5","text":"·Mouse NPCs: vial of mNPCs derived from mES mettl3#6Cre from TEF","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"afgne","text":"·Neurobasal (Thermo scientific, cat. no. 21103-049)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hnju","text":"·DMEM/F12 (Thermo scientific, cat. no. 11320-033 )","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdbnd","text":"·N2 supplement (Gibco, cat. no. 17502-048)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ck0k","text":"·Phosphate-buffered saline (PBS; Life technologies, cat. no. 14190-169)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dp1vc","text":"·EDTA 0.5M pH 8","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dmc0","text":"·B27 minus vitamin A (Gibco, cat. no. 11500446)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88khj","text":"·Non-essential amino acids (Thermo scientific, cat no.11140-035)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dv66b","text":"·2-mercaptpethanol (Thermo scientific, cat no.31350-010)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4gbti","text":"·Glutamax (life technologies, cat no. 35050-061)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49oif","text":"·P/S (Thermo scientific, cat no. 15140-122)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cj22l","text":"·Laminin (Sigma cat no. L2020)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ldff","text":"·Poli-L-Ornithine solution (Sigma cat no. A004-C)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"co6ru","text":"·EGF (Gibco, cat no. PMG3043) ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fohim","text":"·FGF2 (aka bFGF) (Stem cell technologies, cat no. 78003) ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9m395","text":"·DAPT (Selleck,cat no. S2215)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fc5dt","text":"·BDNF (Sigma,cat no. B3795)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68g0","text":"·FBS","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"nuad","text":"·DMSO ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53vps","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ad95i","text":"●N2B27 medium:","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eol2s","text":"     Component      Volume for 50ml        Neurobasal      24 mL        DMEM/F12      24 mL        P/S      0.5 mL        MEM Non-Essential Amino Acids Solution      0.5 mL        GlutaMAX™- 100X      0.5 mL        B-27 without vitamin A      0.5 mL        N2      0.25 mL        β-mercaptoethanol, 1000X. Sigma M-7522      50 uL   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":332}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ljgi","text":"This medium could be stored 1 month at 4 C","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":42}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66i1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnhnj","text":"●NPC medium: \nN2B27 + EGF 10 ng/ml + FGF2 10 ng/ml","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23a8j","text":"●differentiation medium: \nN2B27 + BDNF 40 ng/ml + DAPT 10 uM","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cq26c","text":" status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2gdl7","text":"-Fully coat the wells with diluted PLO (i.e. 500 ul per well in a 12WP)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3u16t","text":"-Leave in the incubator for minimum 2h (also overnight works)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cr704","text":"-Aspirate the PLO and wash three times with sterile H2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fgl2v","text":"-Fully coat the wells with diluted Laminin (i.e. 500 ul per well in a 12WP)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dmjun","text":"-Leave in the incubator for minimum 2h (also overnight works)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"460uh","text":"-count the desired number of cells:  Plate ~100.000 cells on a coverslip, ~150.000 cells in a 24WP well, ~250.000 cells in a 12WP well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9rtrh","text":"-seed NPCs for the final differentiation in NPC medium","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f435","text":"-immediately add differentiation medium not directly on the bottom of the well but making it go through the walls to avoid disturbing the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6piqr","text":"-Change medium (remove half volume and add half volume of new medium) avoiding the cells’ contact with air every 2-3 days. If at diff day 2-3 you notice overgrowth of glial cells, add AraC 1uM to the media in order to stop proliferation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ad8ie","text":"Cells can be kept in colture for \u003e14 days, but they are already MAP2+ and TUJ1+ at day 7.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fnqks","text":"-Add 2.5 uM Tamoxifen to the medium, and the corresponding volume of metOH as control. Incubate for at least 6 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Differentiation of mature neurons from mouse NPCs
title_html: Differentiation of mature neurons from mouse NPCs
